title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Supplied video obtained Monday, October 7, 2019, of Extinction Rebellion Aotearoa protesters occupying the ANZ Bank on Lambton Quay in Wellington, New Zealand. Protest spokesman Simon Oosterman says "we are in the middle of a climate emergency." "The thing is, ANZ isn't just lending money, they are encouraging the fossil fuel industry," he says. "The reason why we are here is because we believe that all life has the right to thrive. Some people call us protesters, I think we are protecters. "We've got a really simple choice, either we make history, or we're history." The protesters then stage a die-in for all the people suffering as a result of climate change. (AAP VIDEO/Supplied/Extinction Rebellion Aotearoa)
